name: Grifols, S.A.
description: Grifols, S.A. is a global healthcare company dedicated to improving the health and well-being of people around the world. Founded in 1909 in Barcelona, Spain, Grifols specializes in the development of plasma-derived medicines, diagnostic products, and hospital pharmacy solutions. With a strong commitment to innovation, the company invests heavily in research and development to create therapies for patients suffering from rare and chronic diseases. Grifols operates through three main divisions: Bioscience, Diagnostic, and Hospital. The Bioscience division is known for its extensive portfolio of life-saving therapies derived from human plasma, including treatments for hemophilia, immunodeficiencies, and other conditions. The Diagnostic division focuses on developing innovative diagnostic products that enhance patient care and safety, while the Hospital division provides essential medications and support to healthcare providers. Grifols has a significant global presence with operations in more than 30 countries and a workforce of over 24,000 employees. The company's mission is to contribute to the health of society through the development of new therapies and technologies, ensuring high-quality standards and ethical practices in all its operations.
